message: Congratulations! You're one of the first few buyers to have the opportunity to purchase a product from me. I'm excited to offer you this high-quality item for $1000000. I've had a great track record of selling high-quality products, with 4 out of 10 products sold so far being of high quality. Don't miss out on this chance to own a top-notch product!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to buy without any information about the quality of the product. With a 66.67% chance of being low quality, the risk is too high for me. I'd appreciate it if you could provide some information on the quality of this specific product before I make a decision.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to consider my offer. I'd like to assure you that this high-quality product is one of the best I've ever had the pleasure of selling. In fact, it's one of the top 20% of all products I've sold so far, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations. With this information, I'm offering it to you for the same price of $1000000. Would you like to take a chance on this exceptional product?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence in the product, I'm hesitant to purchase it without any prior sales data. I'd prefer to see some evidence that the product is indeed high quality before making a decision.  Perhaps you could offer a lower price or provide more information about the product itself.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to consider my offer. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this high-quality product at a special price of $900000. This is the lowest price I've ever offered for a product of this caliber, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. I'm willing to make this exception because I believe this product will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take advantage of this limited-time offer?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm not comfortable purchasing the product at this price without more information. I understand it's a unique opportunity, but with the current lack of sales data and a 66.67% chance of getting a low-quality product, I'm not willing to take the risk. I'd be interested in revisiting this if you were willing to offer a lower price or provide more information about the quality of the product. Perhaps a guarantee or some kind of refund policy could sway my decision.
